channel.title: Where would i make a thread coder thread?
channel.description:
Hello, I am N0 N4M3. I love to code things and I don't understand private server coding and I can't download anything on my computer, so I[hr] decided I would do coding on the forums. I would like to know where I can make a thread about this business I guess you would call it. I[hr] have a couple references already and I would like to get my name out there and get some more stuff to code. Basically, someone will post [hr]a link to their thread and I will code it for them in exchange for a mod/admin position on the server. Please, anyone who knows or atleast[hr] has an idea on what I should do, post it here. Greatly appreciated. [hr]EDIT: If you would like to see a sample of my work, look up Teh0wn-Scape. First post was coded by me.
[hr][glow=black,7,800][tt][size=14pt]N0 N4M3[/size][/tt][/glow][hr]

item.title: Where would i make a thread coder thread?
item.dc:creator: @N0_N4M3 N0 N4M3
item.description:
@N0_N4M3 wrote:

I code the first posts, look at Teh0wn-Scape’s first post, It was just plain text before, but I coded it to make it stand out and grab peoples attention. Most server owners don’t know how to/Don’t care to/ Don’t have the time to do this, so I do it, plus I enjoy it.

Read full topic
item.source: Where would i make a thread coder thread?

item.title: Where would i make a thread coder thread?
item.dc:creator: @I_Prious_I I Prious I
item.description:
@I_Prious_I wrote:

You code threads? As in… I don’t understand. Please explain more.

Read full topic
